name: Knock
description: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.
details: You make the target easier to open. Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting knock, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

pf2t.name: Knock
pf2t.body:
**Duration** 1 minute
**Targets** 1 door, lock, or container

- - -

You make the target easier to open. Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting knock, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

Knock counteracts lock.

name: Know Direction
details: In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location).

heightened.change: You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.
